conversations.content: Perform the following tasks in the order they are given: 1. How many appointments do I have on May 15th, 2024? Please give me a summary of the description for each appointment. 2. Please get me the link to reset my TechServices password. It should be in an email I received recently.

<function_thought>
To complete the user's tasks, I will first retrieve the appointments for May 15th, 2024. This will allow me to provide a summary of the descriptions for each appointment. Once I have that information, I will proceed to search for an email containing the link to reset the TechServices password. The current information requires me to check the calendar for any appointments on the specified date.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>
